attributes.action: Pay award for gp surgery staff not on agenda for change
attributes.additional_details:
if we are not an nhs service then why are we eligible to participate 
in the Network Contract DES: and provide these services and treat patients so they do not impact the emergency departments 
a. we hold a primary medical services contract;
b. we have a registered list of patients which means that persons are 
recorded in the registration system approved by NHS England
c.we provide  primary medical services  
to offer in-hours (essential services) primary medical services

With us the NHS would not survive we are vital -appreciate us
attributes.background:
the non agenda for change gp staff have gone above and beyond during the covid pandemic and after

We ask for fairness we too are asking for the one off pay award and pay rises in line with inflation.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about pay for non-NHS staff employed in GP surgeries are a matter for their employers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
